short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Set the default sort on Yelp to Newest First

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of seeing "Yelp Sort" as the default sort for Yelp reviews? What does Yelp Sort even mean? Why is a review from 1 year ago the first thing I see?

This extension defaults Yelp review sorting to "Newest First," so you can get the most up-to-date reviews upfront. It's what every sensible person wants.

This extension is very, very simple. When we detect that you are on a Yelp page, we set the sort to Newest First in case it is not already set. Under the hood, this is done by adding the sort_by query param.

Code for this extension is open source: https://github.com/sharmilajesupaul/yelp-sort-extension
